movieList.Title: Black Panther
movieList.Writer: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert Cole, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel Comics by)
movieList.Actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
movieList.Plot: After the death of his father, Prince T'Challa ascends to the throne of the small African country of Wakanda. T'Challa is also Black Panther, superhero. Now not only must he govern his country but defeat a dangerous adversary.
movieList.Country: USA, South Africa, South Korea, Australia

movieList.Title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movieList.Writer: Christopher McQuarrie, Bruce Geller (based on the television series created by)
movieList.Actors: Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg
movieList.Plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

movieList.Title: BlacKkKlansman
movieList.Writer: Charlie Wachtel, David Rabinowitz, Kevin Willmott, Spike Lee, Ron Stallworth (based on the book by)
movieList.Actors: Alec Baldwin, John David Washington, Isiah Whitlock Jr., Robert John Burke
movieList.Plot: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

movieList.Title: A Star Is Born
movieList.Writer: Eric Roth (screenplay by), Bradley Cooper (screenplay by), Will Fetters (screenplay by), Moss Hart (based on the 1954 screenplay by), John Gregory Dunne (based on the 1976 screenplay by), Joan Didion (based on the 1976 screenplay by), Frank Pierson (based on the 1976 screenplay by), William A. Wellman (based on a story by), Robert Carson (based on a story by)
movieList.Actors: Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay
movieList.Plot: A musician helps a young singer find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

movieList.Title: A Quiet Place
movieList.Writer: Bryan Woods (screenplay by), Scott Beck (screenplay by), John Krasinski (screenplay by), Bryan Woods (story by), Scott Beck (story by)
movieList.Actors: Emily Blunt, John Krasinski, Millicent Simmonds, Noah Jupe
movieList.Plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

movieList.Plot: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.

movieList.Actors: Elsie Fisher, Josh Hamilton, Emily Robinson, Jake Ryan
movieList.Plot: An introverted teenage girl tries to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth grade year before leaving to start high school.

movieList.Title: Leave No Trace

movieList.Actors: Thomasin McKenzie, Ben Foster, Jeffery Rifflard, Derek John Drescher
movieList.Plot: A father and his thirteen year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon, when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

movieList.Title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
movieList.Actors: Fred Rogers, Joanne Rogers, John Rogers, Jim Rogers
movieList.Plot: An exploration of the life, lessons, and legacy of iconic children's television host, Fred Rogers.

movieList.Title: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
movieList.Writer: Nicole Holofcener (screenplay by), Jeff Whitty (screenplay by)
movieList.Actors: Melissa McCarthy, Richard E. Grant, Dolly Wells, Ben Falcone
movieList.Plot: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception. An adaptation of the memoir Can You Ever Forgive Me?, the true story of best-selling celebrity biographer Lee Israel.
